name: Volkswagen Tiguan
description: The price of Volkswagen Tiguan, a 5 seater SUV, starts from  of Rs. 35.17 Lakh. It is available in 1 variant, with an engine of 1984 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. Tiguan has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Volkswagen Tiguan is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 12.65 kmpl for Tiguan.
